segments.text: What separates your product from the competition ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our product features inventory tracking software , which continuously updates and tracks your inventory on a real-time basis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes it is very easy to use and each system installation comes with a 3 - day employee training seminar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this training part of the package or will it cost extra ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our quoted price includes the software system , installation , 3 day training seminar and ongoing troubleshooting.There are no hidden costs .
segments.speaker: S2
